classify_cancer.title: Load the internal cancer classify demo dataset http://www.sph.emory.edu/~dkleinb/datasets/cancer.dat

parameters.name: qcut
parameters.text: the quantile cutoff threshold for define points as low density points(noise).

density2DCut.returns: a new dataframe object with data fields: x, y, density, and noise boolean flags
density2DCut.title: Evaluate geom density of 2d points

http_get.details: using of the http get function required of set options of ``http.cache_dir`` at first! The ``http.cache_dir`` could a directory folder path to the local filesystem, or a reference symbol name in the global environment for get a filesystem wrapper object.

parameters.name: streamTo
parameters.text: A lambda function that accept a url and a parameter of file cache location. this parameter should run http get request from the remote server and then save file to local cache.

http_get.title: A general method for Http get request

getImage.details: using of the http get function required of set options of ``http.cache_dir`` at first!
getImage.title: Request image from remote server or local cache

getHtml.details: using of the http get function required of set options of ``http.cache_dir`` at first!

parameters.name: url
parameters.text: the url of the resource data on the remote server

parameters.name: interval
parameters.text: the time interval in seconds for sleep after request data from the remote server.

getHtml.title: Http get html or from cache

getJSON.details: this function works on the ``http_get`` function, so that the options for ``http_get``: http.cache_dir and http.debug is required as well.

parameters.name: raw_text
parameters.text: this parameter determine that the function return value is the raw json character text data or ``R#`` object value.

parameters.name: url
parameters.text: the web resource of the target json resource object.

getJSON.title: get json web request

scale0_1.returns: vector or matrix with all values adjusted 0-1 scale relative to each other.
scale0_1.title: Scale values to 0-1 range relative to each other.

Rdocuments.details: the parameter pkgName is different with package parameter, for 1. package parameter is standard for the R# zip package its namespace 2. pkgName parameter usually be one of a clr dll module

parameters.name: pkgName
parameters.text: the ``R#`` package module itself or the package character text name.

parameters.name: outputdir
parameters.text: the output directory path for save the html documents.

parameters.name: package
parameters.text: a character vector for display the package name

Rdocuments.title: Create html documents for ``R#`` package module

parameters.name: url
parameters.text: the url or local filepath of the target html document

parameters.name: graphquery
parameters.text: the script text of a required given graphquery

queryWeb.returns: A ``R#`` object that parsed from the target html web page with given query expression value.
queryWeb.title: Run graphquery on html document

walkFiles.title: process a single vb.net source file

parameters.name: stat
parameters.text: list(totalLines = [], commentLines = [], blankLines = [], size = [], lineOfCodes = [], classes = [], method = [], operator = [], functions = [], property = [], files = [], projList = [])
